Class PathUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.hackcaffebabe.ioutil.file.PathUtil

  • public final class PathUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class that provide System constants and file system features.

    • Method Detail

      • copyDirectory

        public static void copyDirectory(java.io.File source,
                                 java.io.File destination)
                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                 java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        This method copy recursively all content of source folder to destination folder.
        Parameters:
        source - File source folder to copy.
        destination - File destination folder where source will be copied.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there are file system issues.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if argument given are null, the same folder or destination folder is a file.

      • readContent

        public static java.lang.String readContent(java.io.File path)
                                    throws java.io.IOException,
                                           java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        This method reads a file content line by line.
        Parameters:
        path - File the file to read content.
        Returns:
        String of his content.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if read fails
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if argument given is null, not exists or is a directory.

      • forceReadContent

        public static java.lang.String forceReadContent(java.io.File path)
                                         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        This method force to read all the content of file given (if exists and is not a directory) without throws no IOException. If throws, it returns the content read until that point.
        Parameters:
        path - File the file to read content.
        Returns:
        String of his content.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if argument given is null.
